description: This source file appears to be a command-line interface (CLI) script for initializing various types of software projects using a tool called 'Universal Project Initializer'. It defines functions to parse CLI parameters, create project configurations, and output JSON results, and includes a main function that handles argument parsing, project creation, and initialization logic.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Represents configuration options for a project, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration or class providing project type classification, with a method to parse string representations.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Container class holding initialization information for project templates, including commands, environment configs, files, and scripts.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriate type conversions.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a given base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes TemplateInitInfo into a dictionary, converting file paths to absolute paths.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a JSON-formatted string summarizing success/failure and message, optionally including template info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main execution function that sets up argument parsing, creates project configuration, initializes the project, and outputs results.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
